item.title: DFW-12-series-cable-distribution-box
item.description:
Product Overview

DFW-12 outdoor high-voltage cable distribution box is specially used at the cable node of AC 12kV cable system to distribute electric energy. Its connection method is simple and convenient, and has the characteristics of full insulation, full sealing, corrosion resistance, maintenance-free, and exposed safety parts. It solves the problems of cable “T” connection and ring network power supply with multiple incoming and outgoing lines with advanced technology. The product form can be divided into switch branch box, European branch box and American branch box. The cable connection of the incoming and outgoing lines adopts fully insulated cable joints, which are easy to install and reliable to use. The surface of the outer box is processed by electrostatic spraying process, which is beautiful, generous and safe, and can be processed in different colors according to different environments. There are corresponding cable fixing clips and grounding terminals in the box. Reliable, small size, light weight, beautiful appearance, no oil, simple installation, flexible grounding, no live electricity.

Performance characteristics：

◆Fully insulated and fully sealed structure, no need for insulation distance, reliable guarantee of personal safety.

◆The combination is extremely flexible, meeting various wiring requirements (two inputs and four outputs, one input and six outputs, etc.).

◆Small size, compact structure, easy installation and operation.

◆Dustproof, fireproof, corrosion-proof, maintenance-free, suitable for any harsh environment.

◆Two-load switch type branch box can be used for ring network power supply or dual-circuit power supply, which greatly improves the reliability of power supply with a small increase in investment.

◆Single-load switch type branch box can be used at the end of the line, which is convenient for line maintenance and repair.

◆The shell is made of aluminum-zinc coated plate or stainless steel plate, and painted according to the color required by the user.

We welcome global agents, distributors, retailers, and other partners to join us and work together to develop mutually beneficial business relationships. Our products have already been well received by customers in many countries and regions, and we look forward to expanding our reach even further.

contact us: sales@senkuogroup.com

item.title: DFW-12-outdoor-opening-and-closing-station-cable-distribution-box
item.description:
Product Overview

DFW series European-style high-voltage cable branch box is widely used in the node connection of 10KV cable system, and is the main electrical equipment for collecting and branching cables after they come out of the switch cabinet. DFW branch box is designed for outdoor maintenance-free operation, safe and reliable, its protection level is IP33~IP66, and the underground tap can withstand flooding. This product is widely used in urban industrial districts, residential districts, commercial centers, mining areas, large enterprises such as steel, automobile, petroleum, chemical industry, cement and other occasions in the distribution network, especially suitable for urban power grid reconstruction projects, which can greatly save electrical equipment and Cable investment to improve power supply reliability.

The cable branch box is divided into two categories according to its electrical composition: one type does not contain any switchgear, and there are only accessories for processing and connecting the cable ends in the box. The structure is relatively simple, the volume is small, and the function is relatively single. It can be called an ordinary branch box; the other type is that there are not only the accessories of the ordinary branch box in the box, but also one or more switchgears. High, can be called advanced distribution box.

Performance characteristics：

  1. Fully insulated, fully sealed, fully protected, and fully working.

  2. The incoming and outgoing lines are flexible, and there are at most 9 branch incoming and outgoing lines in practical applications.

  3. Anti-flood, anti-pollution, anti-condensation, anti-frost, corrosion resistance.

  4. Small size, compact structure, simple installation and easy operation.

  5. A live indicator can be installed to remind the operator that the line is live.

  6. A cable-type fault indicator can be installed, which is convenient for quickly finding cable faults.

The main technical parameters:

  1. Rated voltage: 12kV

  2. Rated frequency: 50/60Hz

  3. Rated current: 630A

  4. Rated short-time withstand current: 25kV/4s

  5. Rated peak withstand current: 50kA

  6. Rated breaking capacitance current: 45A

  7. Rated breaking capacitor current: 16A

  8. Rated short-circuit switching current: 50kA

  9. Power frequency withstand voltage (phase-to-ground): 42kV/min

  10. Lightning impulse voltage: 75kV

item.title: DFW-40.5-outdoor-opening-and-closing-station
item.description:
Product Overview

DFW-40.5kV series, 40.5KV cable distribution box and cable distribution box with high-voltage switch, high-voltage live display environmental protection outdoor cable distribution box, is a relatively advanced high-voltage equipment in China, making up for 35KV (40.5KV) with high voltage The blank of the switch cable distribution box is suitable for the transmission and distribution of AC 50Hz 40.5kV electrical lines. It is a new structure of outdoor ring network switchgear. DFW-40.5 outdoor high voltage cable branch box custom manufacturer

Performance characteristics：

  1. Outdoor type DFW type, DFKW type, indoor type DFN type, DFKN type, fully sealed structure, “five defenses” safety, maintenance-free, reliable personal safety guarantee.

  2. High-voltage live display environment-friendly outdoor cable branch box, which simplifies the urban cable network system and saves investment.

  3. Outdoor type, dust-proof, moisture-proof, flood-resistant, corrosion-resistant, strong environmental adaptability, flexible combination, from one input line to multiple lines, can meet various wiring requirements.

  4. Small size, compact structure, elegant appearance, simple installation, convenient operation mode conversion, and flexible protection setting. And there is a charged display, which can be equipped with a short-circuit indicator and a lightning arrester.

  5. Small footprint, low height, beautiful appearance, can coordinate with the surrounding environment, flexible and diverse wiring schemes, and extremely convenient installation and operation.

  6. The cable branch box is equipped with a load switch and can be equipped with a grounding switch, and is equipped with a special manual operation mechanism or an electric operation mechanism. At the same time, it has the function of isolating switch, and a short-circuit fault indicator can be installed to quickly determine the fault location.

  7. Through any combination of load switch and cable connector, flexible wiring can meet various wiring requirements, improve the flexibility of line operation, maintenance and overhaul, reduce line power failure time, and improve power supply reliability. It can replace some ring network cabinets or switching stations, reducing the overall cost of the system.
